DOC.brief_summary: The overall aim propose study determine optimal parameter focal muscle vibration improve spasticity identify neurophysiological mechanism healthy subject . In investigation I-1 , subject undergo focal muscle vibration 40 , 80 , 120 Hz frequency medial gastrocnemius muscle ( mGCM ) . As surrogate maker spasticity , H-reflex compound motor action potential ( CMAP ) tibial nerve mGCM record pre , , post vibration . In investigation I-2 , subject undergo focal muscle vibration 0.1 , 0.3 , 0.5 mm amplitude mGCM . H-reflex CMAP tibial nerve mGCM record pre , , post vibration . In investigation II , subject undergo focal muscle vibration predetermine parameter investigation I mGCM . H-reflex CMAP tibial nerve motor evoke potential mGCM record pre , , post vibration .
DOC.brief_title: Developing Optimal Focal Muscle Vibration Improving Spasticity
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer Unstable medical condition History epilepsy History drug abuse
